# <a name="print-email-and-calendars-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="a676f-102">在 Outlook.com 中列印電子郵件和行事曆</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a676f-102">Print email and calendars in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a676f-103">若要列印電子郵件訊息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a676f-103">To print an email message:</span></span>
  
1. <span data-ttu-id="a676f-104">選取您要列印的郵件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a676f-104">Select the message you want to print.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="a676f-105">在郵件的右上角，選取三個點</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a676f-105">At the top right corner of the message, select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="a676f-106">，然後選取</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a676f-106">and then select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="a676f-107">**列印**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a676f-107">**Print**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a676f-108">若要列印您的行事曆：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a676f-108">To print your calendar:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="a676f-109">在頁面的右上角，選取</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a676f-109">At the top right corner of the page, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="a676f-110">**列印**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a676f-110">**Print**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="a676f-111">選擇 [視圖] 和 [時間範圍]，然後選取 [**列印**]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a676f-111">Choose the view and time range, and select **Print**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a676f-112">深入瞭解如何[在 Outlook.com 中列印電子郵件和行事曆](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a676f-112">Learn more about how to [print email and calendars in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
